author: Ben Otto
title: Gays, Unmarried Couples Face Jail for Sex as Islamists Push Legal Changes
text:
JAKARTA, Indonesia—Gay sex, cohabitation, and sex outside marriage would become illegal and punishable with prison terms under proposals from Islamic parties that could soon become law in the world’s largest Muslim-majority nation.
Critics say the moves, which are being negotiated among Indonesia’s political parties and government legislative drafters, would, if enacted, be a major blow to democracy in this Southeast Asian nation of 250 million.
...
